Elemental Affinity

Elemental Affinity is one of the primary magical affinities in Remixed Pixel Dungeon, focusing on spells related to fire, ice, nature, and other elemental forces. The Mage class has Elemental as its primary affinity.

Associated Spells

Spells that fall under the Elemental affinity include:

  • Wind Gust - Creates a blast of wind that can push enemies and activate switches
  • Ignite - Sets enemies or area on fire
  • Freeze Globe - Creates an area of freezing effect
  • Lightning Bolt - Casts a bolt of lightning at an enemy
  • Root - Immobilizes enemies in place
  • Nature Armor - Provides protection through natural means

Classes with Elemental Affinity

  • Mage - Primary affinity for the Mage class
  • Other classes may gain access to elemental spells through special means

Mechanics

Elemental affinity spells often involve:

  • Direct damage effects
  • Area of effect abilities
  • Environmental manipulation
  • Element-based status effects like burning or freezing
